result.execSummary:
On one or more charges, the deferred prosecution or sentencing agreement(s) on this case were fulfilled, and the charge(s) were dismissed.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dennis L. MAURER

records.addlTxt: from DOJ for copies. Emailed May 8, 2018

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Motion and Order to Dismiss ordering count 1 of the action dismissed without prejudice because the defendant successfully completed the Deferred Judgment Agreement.

Stipulation and Order Modifying Bail Conditions.
It is hereby ordered that the defendant's bail/bond conditions be modified as follows:
1) that the firearms currently held at the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department belonging to Mr. Maurer and/or his wife, Jodi Maurer, may be released to Jodi Maurer, provided that they will then be held by a responsible third party who does not reside in the same household as the defendant, Dennis Maurer.
2) that for clarification purposes, the defendant's wife, Jodi Maurer, shall be allowed to hunt on the property that she and Dennis own, except that the defendant, Dennis Maurer, shall not hunt with her at any time Jodi is in possession of a firearm, and no firearm shall be brought into the residence. Further, when Jodi is not utilizing the firearm for hunting purposes, she shall keep said firearm locked in her vehicle.
3) That unless modified herein, all previous conditions of the court shall remain in  full force and effect.
Cover letter.

State moves to delete the penalty enhancers of domestic abuse and with dangerous weapon on count 1.  Motion granted.   
Count 1 - Disorderly conduct - No contest plea.   Court accepts defendant's plea, finds him guilty but defers entry of judgment of conviction pursuant to the Deferred Judgment Agreement.   Review   10-14-16.   
State moves to dismiss and read in count 2, operate firearm while intoxicated.   Motion granted.   
Court amends defendant's condition of bond that outside of work, defendant will not touch any firearms.  The firearms at the sheriff's department are to remain there until the completion of DJA.   
Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights.
Minutes.
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Leave for Additional Time to File Additional Motions
Defendant's Demand for discover and inspection

Stipulation and Order to Amend Recognizance Bail Bond.
It is ordered that the bail condition stating that defendant is to have no contact with 8001 Rockwood Road is hereby stricken and the defendant shall be allowed to have contact with 8001 Rockwood Road and that except as noted, all of the other conditions of the recognizance bond dated 06-30-15 shall remain in fullforce and effect.
Copy to jail.
Not guilty pleas.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with District Attorney set for 09-04-15 at 3:00 p.m.  Plea date is set for 10-14-15 at 10:00 a.m.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of disorderly conduct-dvo and recklessly endanger safety by intoxicated use of firearm.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 07-20-15 at 1:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $650.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that he have no contact with 8001 Rockwood Road and no assaultive or abusive contact with Denise Maurer, maintain absolute sobriety and firearms are to be removed by defendant's wife by 07-03-15.   Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Minutes.
